aors.model.agtsim.agentControl
Class AgentControlInitializer

java.lang.Object
  aors.model.agtsim.agentControl.AgentControlInitializer

public abstract class AgentControlInitializer
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides all neccessary information to initialize agent control for an agent subject. Its concrete implementation is created by the code generation.
